title: Noon.com Product Scraper Input
description: Extract products from Noon.com UAE. Provide a category or product listing URL to scrape products with details including prices, ratings, images, and more.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Noon.com category or listing page URL to start scraping from (e.g., https://www.noon.com/uae-en/fashion/men-31225/)

maxProducts.title: Maximum Products
maxProducts.description: Maximum number of products to scrape. Set to 0 for unlimited.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to crawl.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
